aka: The FARC Guerilla, a History of the Future

writer.name: 皮埃尔·查尔斯 Pierre Carles

director.name: 皮埃尔·查尔斯 Pierre Carles

this_title: Guérilla des Farc, l’avenir a une histoire
trans_title: The FARC Guerilla, a History of the Future
introduction: Under the auspices of Rio Chiquito, Bruno Muel and Jean-Pierre Sergent’s 1965 report on the birth of the FARC, and Dunav Kuzmanich’s 1981 fiction film Canaguaro about the end of the Liberal guerillas, this is look back on 70 years of clandestine life in the Columbian forest. Women and men who took up arms amid profound social inequality and political violence recount their years as fighters and their return to civilian life, without disowning their past. From 2012, when the peace negotiations began, to 2022 — the story of a new struggle.源自：https://www.cinemadureel.org/en/films/the-farc-guerilla-a-history-of-the-future/
chinese_title: Guérilla des Farc, l’avenir a une histoire
